properties.entry: The mipmap description for level {0} specifies that the mipmap data should be {1} octets uncompressed, but the actual data was {2} octets.
The Z size of a 2D texture must equal 1, but was {0}.
The Z size of a cube texture must equal 1, but was {0}.
Duplicate mip level {0} specified.
Mip levels must be strictly decreasing with all values present in the range [0 … {0}].
Duplicate mip level {0} specified.
Mip levels must be strictly decreasing with all values present in the range [0 … {0}].
The mipmap description for level {0} specifies a CRC32 value of 0x{1} but the actual data had a CRC32 of 0x{2}.
The mipmap description for layer {0}, level {1} specifies that the mipmap data should be {2} octets uncompressed, but the actual data was {3} octets.
The mipmap description for layer {0}, face {1} specifies that the mipmap data should be {2} octets uncompressed, but the actual data was {3} octets.
Duplicate mip level {0} specified.
Mip levels must be strictly decreasing with all values present in the range [0 … {0}].
Mip layers (for level {0}) must be strictly increasing with all values present in the range [0 … {1}] (received {2}).
The mipmap description for layer {0}, level {1} specifies a CRC32 value of 0x{2} but the actual data had a CRC32 of 0x{3}.
The mipmap description for layer {0}, face {1} specifies a CRC32 value of 0x{2} but the actual data had a CRC32 of 0x{3}.
Mip layer {0}, layer {1} is not unique.
The texture file specifies a Z size of {0} but provides {1} layers.
Texture files must contain exactly one of any of the various texture data sections.
The first section in a texture should be an image information section.
For uncompressed image data, the compressed size {0} must equal the uncompressed size {1} (at layer {2}, level {3}).
For uncompressed image data, the compressed size {0} must equal the uncompressed size {1} (at level {2}).
For uncompressed image data, the compressed size {0} must equal the uncompressed size {1} (at level {2}).
The compressed size of image data should be greater than zero (at layer {0}, level {1}).
The compressed size of image data should be greater than zero (at level {0}).
The compressed size of image data should be greater than zero (at level {0}, face {1}).
The uncompressed size of image data should be greater than zero (at layer {0}, level {1}).
The uncompressed size of image data should be greater than zero (at level {0}).
The uncompressed size of image data should be greater than zero (at level {0}, face {1}).
Array textures must have at least one mipmap.
2D textures must have at least one mipmap.
Cube textures must have at least one mipmap.
File section 0x{0} is unaligned; it begins at 0x{1} which is not a 16-octet boundary.
The 'end' section is of a non-zero size ({0}).
Texture files are required to have a zero-size 'end' section.
The data offset of image data within a section should be greater than zero.
The data offset of image data within a section should be greater than zero.
The data offset of image data within a section should be greater than zero.
{0} octets of trailing data were encountered after the 'end' section.
Cube mipmaps cannot have missing faces (at level {0}, face {1}).
